v0.1.1.description:
An initial attempt at a Warioworld(GC) APWorld!

In order to play this you will need:
An NTSC-U copy of Warioworld for the Nintendo Gamecube
Dolphin Emulator

To set this up, please download and drag the .apworld file into the custom_worlds folder of your archipelago install and use this yaml like any other: (check https://archipelago.gg/ for more info)

DO NOT GO PAST THE PRESS START SCREEN BEFORE THE PATCH IS APPLIED, OR YOU WILL NEED TO RESTART WARIOWORLD
To know if the patch is applied correctly, pressing start on the PRESS START screen will send you straight into the game without a file select option. Have Fun!

>fixed a bug that would cause the game to sometimes be unbeatable if plant ending was selected
v0.1.1.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.1

v0.1.2.description:
An initial attempt at a Warioworld(GC) APWorld!

In order to play this you will need:
An NTSC-U copy of Warioworld for the Nintendo Gamecube
Dolphin Emulator

To set this up, please download and drag the .apworld file into the custom_worlds folder of your archipelago install and generate a yaml using the `Generate Template Options` box in the launcher: (check https://archipelago.gg/ for more info)

DO NOT GO PAST THE PRESS START SCREEN BEFORE THE PATCH IS APPLIED, OR YOU WILL NEED TO RESTART WARIOWORLD/SAVE AND LOAD A STATE
To know if the patch is applied correctly, pressing start on the PRESS START screen will send you straight into the game without a file select option. Have Fun!

> fixed a bug that would cause the game to sometimes be unbeatable if plant ending was selected
> fixed a bug that would cause all big keys to be given if an option other than 0 was selected
v0.1.2.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.2

v0.1.3.description: > fixed a bug that would cause locations to respawn upon reloading the game/going back to the start menu
v0.1.3.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.3

v0.1.4.description:
> Fixed a bug that caused Mirror Mansion Washing Machine Trapdoor level to not spawn the tumblers correctly (among other trapdoor levels)
> Fixed a random crash when entering certain levels where a Spriteling Cage was in view from the spawnpoint
> Fixed a bug that caused the game to crash on Horror Manor when Big Bone-Fist would use the Slapdown Attack
> Fixed a bug that caused Filler Items not to spawn, leading to some checks needing to be collected twice to count
> Fixed a bug that caused the Client to be filled with error messages that didn't actually cause any problems
v0.1.4.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.4

v0.1.5.description:
> fixed final boss not starting when 4 keys are acquired
> added trap AND filler items, though they show up as unknown ID (RESTARTING THE CLIENT WILL CAUSE THESE TO SPAWN MULTIPLE TIMES, BEWARE)
# Known Issues
> Some bosses do not give their checks on completion (python bug)
> Some checks need to be collected twice to count (code bug, idk why this happens, even savestates don't replicate this)
v0.1.5.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.5

v0.1.6.description:
# Fixes
> Fixed final boss not triggering when having all Big Key Fragments (this game is now beatable)
> Fixed releasing not working properly

# Known Issues
> Filler/Trap Items show up as Unknown, but work as intended (mostly, the coin exchange rate is very favourable for Wario!)
v0.1.6.title: Warioworld APWorld v0.1.6
